documents.document: Expect nothing, live frugally on surprise. - Alice Walker
It's a sad day when you find out that it's not accident or time or fortune, but just yourself that kept things from you. - Hellman, Lillian
To belittle is to be little. - Kalil Gibran
Love is like any other luxury. You have no right to it unless you can afford it. - Anthony Trollope
Our dreams are meant to come true, you know. What would be the purpose of dreaming if we could not fulfill our dreams? - Gautama Chopra
Happiness is the settling of the soul into its most appropriate spot. - Aristotle
If you knew it all it would not be creation but dictation. - Gertrude Stein
None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm. - Henry David Thoreau
To be in your children's memories tomorrow, You have to be in their lives today. - Barbara Johnson
Writing is not lying, nor is it theft. It is a journey and search for transparency between one's words and one's soul. - Richard Flanagan
So much has been said and sung of beautiful young girls, why don't somebody wake up to the beauty of old women? - Harriet Beecher Stowe
A thousand half-loves must be forsaken to take one whole heart home. - Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
As long as we draw breath, we owe it to the ones we loved and lost to live out our lives without wasting them on regrets. - Sharon Sala
Every problem is a gift - without problems we would not grow. - Anthony Robbins
I'd rather welcome change than cling to the past. - Robert T. Kiyosaki
Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand. - Bob Proctor
First you jump off the cliff and build your wings on the way down. - Ray Bradbury
The trouble with being in the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat. - Lily Tomlin
Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever. - Unknown
Be aware that, Great distances sometimes separate dreamland from reality. - Santosh Kalwar
Capacity for love in its higher forms seems to be peculiarly human although even in humans it is still peculiar. - Jeanette Winterson
Man is a being in search of meaning. - Plato
Brick walls are there for a reason. They let you know how badly you want things. - Randy Pausch
Heaven can be found in the most unlikely corners. - Mitch Albom
Life is 10 percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it. - Lou Holtz
What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul. - Deepak Chopra
The human spirit will not invest itself in a compromise. - Robert Fritz
Survivors can't always choose their methods. - Patricia Briggs

No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful. - Eleanor Roosevelt
Remember, goals are stars to steer by, not sticks with which to beat ourselves. - Barbara Smith
We mark some days as fair, some as foul, because we do not see that the character of every day as identical - Charles Frazier
No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true. - Walt Disney Company
Just because you do not take an interest in politics doesn't mean politics won't take an interest in you. - Pericles
It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it. - Lou Holtz
To every problem, there is a most simple solution. - Agatha Christie
What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul. - Deepak Chopra
Love has no uttermost, as the stars have no number and the sea no rest. - Eleanor Farjeon
Those who judge others should know how to judge themselves. - Santosh Kalwar
Until you make peace with who you are, you'll never be content with what you have. - Doris Mortman
You are my butterfly and I refuse to set you free. - Shannon Hale
What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other? - George Eliot
Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese. - Billie Burke
It`s not how old you are, it`s how you are old. - Jules Renard
For a knowledge of intimacy, localization in the spaces of our intimacy is more urgent than determination of dates. - Gaston Bachelard
Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions. - Anaïs Nin
There's only one racing strategy that https://t.co/uNUqSnYEhq's the one I run by: Get in the lead and don't let anyone pass you. - Megan McCafferty
...And we pray, not for new earth or heaven, but to be quiet in heart, and in eye clear. What we need is here. - Wendell Berry
You must take life the way it comes at you and make the best of it. - Yann Martel
I never found beauty in longing for the impossible and never found the possible to be beyond my reach. - Ayn Rand
Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess. - Lemony Snicket
If you teach a boy, you educate an individual; but if you teach a girl, you educate a community. - Greg Mortenson
It's harder to write in the third person but the advantage is you move around better. - Ernest Hemingway
there is no moment more precious than the exact moment you are living now -geth - Obert Skye
Blaze with the fire that is never extinguished. - Luisa Sigea
Lady Croom: It is a defect of God's humour that he directs our hearts everywhere but to those who have a right to them. - Tom Stoppard
Friendship improves happiness, and abates misery, by doubling our joys, and dividing our grief - Marcus Tullius Cicero
Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore. - André Gide
Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone you may still exist, but you have ceased to live. - Mark Twain
The hardest thing about the road not taken is that you never know where it might have led. - Lisa Wingate
The Lord is my Shepherd, I shall not want. - David C. King
Poetry is the rhythmical creation of beauty in words. - Edgar Allan Poe
None of us come to this earth to gain our worth; we brought it with us. - Sheri L. Dew
The duty of youth is to challenge corruption. - Kurt Cobain

The choice is ours to hear the echoes, to heed the call: when life isn't good, taste and see that the Lord is. - Matt Rogers
All that is necessary for evil to succeed is that good men do nothing. - Edmund Burke
Who would bring light must endure burning. - David Zindell
The good life is inspired by love and guided by knowledge. - Bertrand Russell
..because the hardest boss a man can ever have is himself. - Stephen King

As beauty lies in eyes of beholder, struggling lies in reaching further. - Santosh Kalwar
Never travel faster than your guardian angel can fly. - Mother Teresa
The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall. - Vince Lombardi
Love is not a maybe thing, you know when you love someone. - Lauren Conrad
Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired. - Robert Frost
Go for the moon. If you don't get it, you'll still be heading for a star - Willis Reed
Anyone who loves in the expectation of being loved in return is wasting their time. - Paulo Coelho
When you re the only one to do something it always gets done. - Robert Newton Peck
Love God and find him within - the only treasure worth finding. - Meher Baba
We loved with a love that was more than love. - Edgar Allan Poe
Being busy is better than being bored. Bored left a long time ago. Busy is always around for me. - Tabitha Robin
We all can be only who we are, no more, no less. - Terry Goodkind
One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love. - Sophocles
We would rather be ruined than changed; We would rather die in our dread Than climb the cross of the moment And let our illusions die.
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts. - Marcus Aurelius
The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are. - J.P. Morgan
Its not the men in your life that matters, its the life in your men. - Mae West
